name: development-workflow
description: Complete development workflow orchestration with 34 specialized skills for end-to-end product development. Features continuous flow (Kanban) mode for parallel item processing, structured project intake, and SVG design capabilities. Covers strategy, product design, architecture, infrastructure, implementation, observability, operations (SRE, backup, incident management), testing, security, legal compliance, payments, notifications, search, i18n, feature flags, and release management with 10 quality gates, requirements traceability, multi-angle project analysis, and agile feedback loops.
